text:
.@Drake is offering a chance to ride his $200 MILLION private jet as part of the #ALLINCHALLENGE to raise money for COVID-19 relief.

The contest starts at $10 to enter. The winner will enjoy a “full VIP treatment,” join Drake at club Delilah and get tickets to his next show. https://t.co/0PBveFNd5u
